name: Mattress
description: We are assisting a family living in a 3-room flat with a special needs child. Their current mattresses are old and worn, making it difficult for the children to get proper rest. We are seeking 4 single mattresses to provide the children with a comfortable and supportive place to sleep, which will greatly improve their sleep quality and overall wellbeing. These items will make a meaningful difference in supporting the family’s daily needs and the children’s health. We are looking at possibly getting 4 mattresses for our client, at donor’s discretion.

name: Sofa
description: A family of four with 3 years old twins. They are currently residing in a rental flat and are facing financial and employment instability due to ongoing caregiving responsibilities. The family is in the process of securing childcare, which they hope will allow the parents to seek employment and improve their financial situation. They are currently in need of a sofa to improve their living conditions and create a more comfortable home environment for the children. Any support or donation would be greatly appreciated. Please Whatsapp Jie Qi at 8484 6181 or email to jieqi.yeo@thkmc.org.sg to liaise.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Norlizawati Binte Hamid

name: Playpen
description:
Family of 11 requires a PLAYPEN (size of baby cot) for second youngest son to play in away from newborn. Free space in house is very limited, hence size should not exceed size of a baby cot. Ideal for playpen to be on the floor (as child likes to jump) and have higher walls.

*Donor to cover delivery please

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Hougang
contact.name: Ang Hua Jun

passiton.name: Playpen

name: Coffee
description:
PPIS FSCW RELIGHT would like to request for 10 or more packets of halal coffee for its beneficiaries. Thank you! 

RELIGHT is an initiative by PPIS FSC (West) to actively support beneficiaries through disbursement of donated items from individuals and corporate donors. These include daily necessities and fresh produce, which is distributed every quarter of the year.
